poem.title: Limeys
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Taut canvas, creaking sheets And a tot of yo-ho-ho With a splash of lime. And then the rhetorical titter and tatter, The taunt we were taught by tabloid Rags we topped our flaming cocktails with Or used and tossed in the bilge. The settlements we torched! Till someone talked and somebody else Got topped. Oh well, Back to the crossword.
